Aries.description: You are energetic, courageous, and a natural leader.

Taurus.description: You are loyal, patient, and dependable.

Gemini.description: You are intelligent, curious, and adaptable.

Cancer.description: You are emotional, nurturing, and intuitive.

Leo.description: You are confident, creative, and charismatic.

Virgo.description: You are analytical, practical, and detail-oriented.

Libra.description: You are balanced, diplomatic, and charming.

Scorpio.description: You are passionate, mysterious, and determined.

Sagittarius.description: You are adventurous, optimistic, and freedom-loving.

Capricorn.description: You are disciplined, ambitious, and responsible.

Aquarius.description: You are independent, innovative, and humanitarian.

Pisces.description: You are compassionate, imaginative, and intuitive.
